properties.script:
out0 = spark.sql(f"""
    SELECT
    '{Config.sourceSystem}'   AS SRC_SYS_CD,
    aufk.auart AS MFG_ORDR_TYP_CD,
    aufk.aufnr AS MFG_ORDR_NUM,
    case when aufk.aedat = '00000000' then null
    else to_timestamp(aufk.aedat, \"yyyyMMdd\") end as CHG_DTTM,
    TRIM(afko.aufpl) AS ORDR_RTNG_NUM,
    TRIM(afko.dispo) AS MRP_CNTRLLR_CD,
    case when aufk.erdat = '00000000' then null
    else to_timestamp(aufk.erdat,\"yyyyMMdd\") end as CRTD_DTTM,
    TRIM(afko.fevor) AS PRD_SPVSR_CD,
    case when afko.ftrmi = '00000000' then null
 else to_timestamp(afko.ftrmi,\"yyyyMMdd\") end as ACT_RLSE_DTTM,
    case when afko.ftrmp = '00000000' then null
    else to_timestamp(afko.ftrmp,\"yyyyMMdd\") end as PLAN_RLSE_DTTM,
    case when afko.ftrms = '00000000' then null
 else to_timestamp(ftrms,\"yyyyMMdd\") end as SCH_REL_DTTM,
    CASE WHEN afko.getri = '00000000' OR afko.geuzi = '00000000' THEN CAST(NULL AS TIMESTAMP) 
 ELSE to_timestamp(concat(afko.getri, afko.geuzi),\"yyyyMMddHHmmss\") END AS CNFRMD_END_DTTM,
    case when afko.gltri='00000000' then null
 else to_timestamp(afko.gltri, \"yyyyMMdd\") end as PRDTN_END_DTTM,
    CASE WHEN afko.gltrp = '00000000' OR afko.gluzp = '00000000' THEN CAST(NULL AS TIMESTAMP) 
 ELSE to_timestamp(concat(afko.gltrp, afko.gluzp),\"yyyyMMddHHmmss\") END AS END_DTTM,
    CASE WHEN afko.gltrs = '00000000' OR afko.gluzs = '00000000' THEN CAST(NULL AS TIMESTAMP) 
 ELSE to_timestamp(concat(afko.gltrs, afko.gluzs),\"yyyyMMddHHmmss\") END AS SCHD_END_DTTM,
    CASE WHEN afko.gstri = '00000000' OR afko.gsuzi = '00000000' THEN CAST(NULL AS TIMESTAMP)
 ELSE to_timestamp(concat(afko.gstri, afko.gsuzi),\"yyyyMMddHHmmss\") END AS ACT_STRT_DTTM,
    CASE WHEN afko.gstrp = '00000000' OR afko.gsuzp = '00000000' THEN CAST(NULL AS TIMESTAMP) 
 ELSE to_timestamp(concat(afko.gstrp, afko.gsuzp),\"yyyyMMddHHmmss\") END AS STRT_DTTM,
    CASE WHEN afko.gstrs = '00000000' OR afko.gsuzs = '00000000' THEN CAST(NULL AS TIMESTAMP)
 ELSE to_timestamp(concat(afko.gstrs, afko.gsuzs),\"yyyyMMddHHmmss\") END AS SCHD_STRT_DTTM,
    CAST(TRIM(afko.iasmg) AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) AS CNFRMD_SCRP_QTY,
    CAST(TRIM(afko.igmng) AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) AS CNFRMD_YLD_QTY,
    TRIM(aufk.loekz) AS DEL_IND,
    TRIM(aufk.objnr) AS OBJECT_NUMBER,
    TRIM(afko.plnal) AS RTNG_GRP_CNTR_NUM,
    TRIM(afko.plnnr) AS RTNG_GRP_CD,
    TRIM(afko.plnty) AS RTNG_TYP_CD,
    TRIM(afko.rsnum) AS RSRVTN_NUM,
    NULL AS MFG_ORDR_STTS_CD,
    NULL AS MFG_ORDR_STS_TXT,
    TRIM(afko.stlal) AS BOM_ALT_NUM,
    TRIM(afko.stlnr) AS BOM_NUM,
    TRIM(afko.stlty) AS BOM_CAT_CD,
    TRIM(aufk.werks) AS PLNT_CD,
    NULL AS DIR_SHIP_CUST_ADDR_NUM,
    NULL AS MFR_OF_FNL_SKU,
    TRIM(afko.plnbez) AS MATL_NUM,
    CAST(TRIM(afko.gamng) AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) AS TOT_ORDR_QTY,
    CAST(TRIM(afko.gasmg) AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) AS TOT_SCRAP_QTY_IN_ORDR,
    TRIM(afko.gmein) AS BASE_UOM,
    TRIM(afko.plnaw) AS APPL_OF_the_TASK_LIST,
    TRIM(afko.pverw) AS TASK_LIST_USG,
    CAST(TRIM(afko.plsvb) AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) AS MAX_LOT_SIZE,
    TRIM(afko.plnme) AS TASK_LIST_UOM,
    CAST(TRIM(afko.plsvn) AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) AS MIN_LOT_SIZE,
    TRIM(afko.paenr) AS CHG_NUM1,
    TRIM(afko.plgrp) AS RESP_PLNR_GRP_OR_DEPT,
    CAST(TRIM(afko.lodiv) AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) AS LOT_SIZE_DIVSR,
    TRIM(afko.stlbez) AS MATL_NUM1,
    TRIM(afko.stlst) AS BILL_OF_MATL_STS,
    CAST(TRIM(afko.sbmng) AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) AS BASE_QTY,
    TRIM(afko.sbmeh) AS BASE_UNIT_OF_MEAS,
    TRIM(afko.saenr) AS CHG_NUM2,
    TRIM(afko.stlan) AS BOM_USG,
    CAST(TRIM(afko.slsvn) AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) AS FROM_LOT_SIZE,
    CAST(TRIM(afko.slsbs) AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) AS TO_LOT_SIZE,
    TRIM(afko.fhori) AS SCHDLNG_MRGN_KEY_FOR_FLOATS,
    TRIM(afko.terkz) AS SCHDLNG_TYPE,
    TRIM(afko.vorgz) AS FLOAT_BEF_PRDTN,
    TRIM(afko.sichz) AS FLOAT_AFTER_PRDTN,
    TRIM(afko.freiz) AS RLSE_PER,
    TRIM(afko.upter) AS CHG_TO_SCHD_DT_IN,
    TRIM(afko.bedid) AS ID_OF_the_CAPY_RQR_REC,
    TRIM(afko.pronr) AS PROJ_DEF,
    TRIM(afko.zaehl) AS INTRNL_CNTR1,
    TRIM(afko.mzaehl) AS INTRNL_CNTR2,
    TRIM(afko.zkriz) AS CNTR_FOR_ADDL_CRITA,
    TRIM(afko.prueflos) AS INSP_LOT_NUM,
    TRIM(afko.klvarp) AS COST_VRNT_FOR_PLAN_COSTS,
    TRIM(afko.klvari) AS COST_VRNT_FOR_ACTL_COSTS,
    TRIM(afko.rueck) AS CMPLT_CNFRM_NUM_FOR_the_OPR,
    TRIM(afko.rmzhl) AS INTRNL_CNTR3,
    TRIM(afko.cuobj) AS CNFG,
    TRIM(afko.rshid) AS OBJ_ID_OF_the_RSRS1,
    TRIM(afko.rsnid) AS OBJ_ID_OF_the_RSRS2,
    CAST(TRIM(afko.stufe) AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) AS LVL,
    CAST(TRIM(afko.wegxx) AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) AS PATH1,
    CAST(TRIM(afko.vwegx) AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) AS PATH2,
    TRIM(afko.arsnr) AS NUM_OF_RESV,
    TRIM(afko.arsps) AS ORDR_ITM_NUM,
    TRIM(afko.lknot) AS LEFT_NODE_IN_CLCTV_ORDR,
    TRIM(afko.rknot) AS RIGHT_NODE_OF_CLCTV_ORDR,
    TRIM(afko.abarb) AS CNFRM_DEG_OF_PRCSG,
    TRIM(afko.aufpt) AS RTG_NUM_OF_OPS_IN_THE_ORDR,
    TRIM(afko.aplzt) AS GENL_CNTR_FOR_ORDR,
    case when afko.plauf = '00000000' then null
 else to_timestamp(afko.plauf,\"yyyyMMdd\") end as RTG_EXPLS_DTTM,
    case when afko.pdatv = '00000000' then null
 else to_timestamp(afko.pdatv,\"yyyyMMdd\") end as VLD_FROM_DTTM,
    case when afko.sdatv = '00000000' then null
 else to_timestamp(afko.sdatv,\"yyyyMMdd\") end as VLD_FROM_DTTM1,
    case when afko.aufld = '00000000' then null
 else to_timestamp(afko.aufld,\"yyyyMMdd\") end as BOM_EXPLS_TFR_DTTM,
    CASE WHEN afko.gltpp = '00000000' OR afko.glupp = '00000000' THEN CAST(NULL AS TIMESTAMP)
 ELSE to_timestamp(concat(afko.gltpp, afko.glupp),\"yyyyMMddHHmmss\") END AS FIN_DTTM,
    CASE WHEN afko.gstpp = '00000000' OR afko.gsupp = '00000000' THEN CAST(NULL AS TIMESTAMP)
 ELSE to_timestamp(concat(afko.gstpp, afko.gsupp),\"yyyyMMddHHmmss\") END AS FCST_STRT_DTTM,
    CASE WHEN afko.gltps = '00000000' OR afko.glups = '00000000' THEN CAST(NULL AS TIMESTAMP)
 ELSE to_timestamp(concat(afko.gltps, afko.glups),\"yyyyMMddHHmmss\") END AS SCHD_FCST_FIN_DTTM,
    CASE WHEN afko.gstps = '00000000' OR afko.gsups = '00000000' THEN CAST(NULL AS TIMESTAMP)
 ELSE to_timestamp(concat(afko.gstps, afko.gsups),\"yyyyMMddHHmmss\") END AS SCHD_FCST_STRT_DTTM,
    TRIM(aufk.autyp) AS ORDR_CAT,
    TRIM(aufk.refnr) AS REF_ORDR_NUM,
    TRIM(aufk.ernam) AS ENT_BY,
    TRIM(aufk.aenam) AS LAST_CHG_BY,
    TRIM(aufk.ktext) AS DESC,
    TRIM(aufk.ltext) AS LONG_TEXT_EXISTS,
    TRIM(aufk.bukrs) AS CO_CD,
    TRIM(aufk.gsber) AS BUSN_AREA,
    TRIM(aufk.kokrs) AS CNTL_AREA,
    TRIM(aufk.cckey) AS COST_CLCT_KEY,
    TRIM(aufk.waers) AS ORDR_CRNCY,
    TRIM(aufk.astnr) AS ORDR_STS,
    case when aufk.stdat = '00000000' then null
 else to_timestamp(aufk.stdat,\"yyyyMMdd\") end as LAST_STS_CHG_DTTM,
    TRIM(aufk.estnr) AS STS_REACHED_SO_FAR,
    TRIM(aufk.phas1) AS PH_ORDR_RELS,
    TRIM(aufk.phas2) AS PH_ORDR_CMPLT,
    case when aufk.pdat2 = '00000000' then null
 else to_timestamp(aufk.pdat2,\"yyyyMMdd\") end as PLAN_CMPLT_DTTM,
    case when aufk.pdat3 = '00000000' then null
 else to_timestamp(aufk.pdat3,\"yyyyMMdd\") end as PLAN_CLS_DTTM,
    case when aufk.idat1 = '00000000' then null
 else to_timestamp(aufk.idat1,\"yyyyMMdd\") end as RLSE_DTTM,
    case when aufk.idat2 = '00000000' then null
 else to_timestamp(aufk.idat2,\"yyyyMMdd\") end as TECH_CMPLT_DTTM,
    case when aufk.idat3 = '00000000' then null
 else to_timestamp(aufk.idat3,\"yyyyMMdd\") end as CLSE_DTTM,
    TRIM(aufk.objid) AS OBJ_ID,
    TRIM(aufk.kvewe) AS USG_OF_THE_COND_TBL,
    TRIM(aufk.kappl) AS APPL,
    TRIM(aufk.kalsm) AS COST_SHT,
    TRIM(aufk.zschl) AS OVHD_KEY,
    TRIM(aufk.abkrs) AS PRCSG_GRP,
    TRIM(aufk.seqnr) AS SEQ_NUM,
    TRIM(aufk.user0) AS APPLT,
    CAST(TRIM(aufk.user4) AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) AS EST_TOT_COSTS_OF_ORDR,
    case when aufk.user5 = '00000000' then null
 else to_timestamp(aufk.user5,\"yyyyMMdd\") end as APPL_DTTM,
    case when aufk.user7 = '00000000' then null
 else to_timestamp(aufk.user7,\"yyyyMMdd\") end as WRK_STRT_DTTM,
    case when aufk.user8 = '00000000' then null
 else to_timestamp(aufk.user8,\"yyyyMMdd\") end as END_OF_WRK_DTTM,
    TRIM(aufk.prctr) AS PRFT_CTR,
    TRIM(aufk.pspel) AS WRK_BRKDWN_STRC_ELMNT,
    TRIM(aufk.awsls) AS VAR_KEY,
    TRIM(aufk.abgsl) AS RSLTS_ANAL_KEY,
    TRIM(aufk.abukr) AS REQ_CO_CD,
    TRIM(aufk.kdpos) AS ITM_NUM_IN_SLS_ORDR,
    TRIM(aufk.procnr) AS PRDTN_PRCS
FROM {Config.sourceDatabase}.aufk
LEFT JOIN {Config.sourceDatabase}.afko ON aufk.aufnr=afko.aufnr AND afko._deleted_ = 'F' AND afko.MANDT=020
WHERE aufk._deleted_ = 'F' AND aufk.MANDT=020  
 
""")
